parameters.key: =api:instance:{{ $('Get Inbox Token').item.json.data || $('Nml - Instance Token to Cache').item.json.data }}

parameters.url: ={{ $('Mrg - Input Data').item.json.extra.installationUrl }}/api/v1/accounts/{{ $('Mrg - Input Data').item.json.extra.accountId }}/conversations/{{ $('Mrg - Input Data').item.json.extra.conversationId }}/messages/{{ $('Mrg - Input Data').item.json.extra.messageId }}

parameters.key: =MID:{{ $('Uazapi - Send Text').isExecuted ? $('Uazapi - Send Text').item.json.messageid : $('Uazapi - Send Media').item.json.messageid }}

nodes.name: Mrg - Input Data
nodes.notes: Pode ter o payload do Lpop ou... quando √© typing, do pr√≥prio trigger!

parameters.errorMessage: Check instance configs: Without Instance Token!

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO message_map (stanza_id, cw_message_id, installation, cw_account_id, cw_inbox_id, cw_conversation_id, id_with_owner)
VALUES (
  'MID:{{ $('Mrg - Message Data').item.json.messageid }}',
    {{ $('Mrg - Input Data').item.json.extra.messageId }},
    '{{ $('Mrg - Input Data').item.json.extra.installationUrl }}',
    {{ $('Mrg - Input Data').item.json.extra.accountId }},
    {{ $('Mrg - Input Data').item.json.extra.contac_inbox.inbox_id }},
    {{ $('Mrg - Input Data').item.json.extra.conversationId }},
    '{{ $('Mrg - Message Data').item.json.id }}'
);
